paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the population dynamics of the Mediterranean monk seal in the National Marine Park of Alonissos, Greece. As a first general approach, the well-known logistic model and a modified version are used. As a second approach, a theta-logistic type model with delay is adopted. Finally, a modified version of this delay model is proposed and compared with the others. The results are illustrated using computer simulations. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Population dynamics of the Mediterranean monk seal in the National Marine Park of Alonissos, Greece
